instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a mobile-first, dark-mode bio-link platform. Focus on the 'Bento Grid' layout for the public profile page. The dashboard should be clean and utilitarian.

public_profile.layout: Single column on mobile, max-width-md centered on desktop. Header with Avatar + Name + Bio. Below that, a grid of blocks.

blocks.link: Simple rectangular card with icon on left, text center/left, arrow on right.
blocks.music: Card with album art (square) on left, title/artist in middle, play/link buttons on right.
blocks.text: Simple text block for headers or quotes.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation (desktop) or Bottom navigation (mobile). Main content area for managing pages and blocks.
dashboard.editor: Drag-and-drop feel (even if just list for MVP). Live preview on the right (desktop) or toggle (mobile).

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
